about_the_game:
This soundtrack for There's Always a Madman: The MacGuffin includes two tracks: the game's title track "Get the MacGuffin" with lyrics, which can be heard on the game's title screen, and an instrumental version of that same song.

1. The title track "Get the MacGuffin" containing lyrics which plays on the title screen

2. An instrumental version of the title track "Get the MacGuffin"

Note that this only contains these two tracks from the game. It is not a complete soundtrack of all music in the game. This is the only music from the game for sale.
